name: [Beta]Untold Stories
description:
========[Welcome]========
PS: this Game is A Leaked Game From A 1988 Game
Untold Story, Currently Half of the Game
Is Corrupted And Im Still Recovering Some Parts..
Right now, I Manage to get First And Second Part of the 
Game/Story, but the other part.. Ehh.. Not So Much...
This game is Also Licensed to Nexus Studio
Which for Long We Are Now Dropping Support too
As Since Adobe Flash is Dead.. :P
==========================

BE AWARE THAT THIS GAME IS A TEXT ADVENTURE MADE BY TWINE..AND IM STILL ADING MORE MYTH AND LORE REGARDING THROUGH THIS, HOPE YOU CAN SEE THEM ALL :>

==========================
RECOMMENDATION:
Set to Fullscreen(Some Part of the Game isn't Restored Properly So Going Fullscreen is the Only thing i could find)
*IF YOU ENJOY, PLEASE CONSIDER DONATING, SO I CAN FINALLY REPLACE MY POTATO AND SLUG LAPTOP WITH A NEW ONE :]*

Don't Worry This Game Isn't Resource Hungry.. So Yeah!!!
Happy 80's
